item.title: Our story
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
Our Video Play Button Story - OUR LAST 16 YEARS JOURNEY -

We are aparte a young and beautiful team with a passion for tasty and traditional food Rediscovering and relieving traditional romanian delicacies.

- AWARDS AND HONOURS -

Achievements

Restaurant choice award - 2017 Luxury restaurant award - 2019 British best kebab award - 2020 Good food taste award - 2021 25,000+ happy food lovers visited our restaurant.

item.title: Best chef
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
Herman miller

HEAD CHEF AND OWNER Lorem ipsum amet consectetur pellentesque blandit ultrices purus suspendisse iaculis ultricies sagittis. Proin vulputate eleifend cras lacinia iaculis feugiat egestas neque sodales. - PROFESSIONAL CHEF -

Heart of kitchen

Once you understand the foundations of cooking whatever kind you link. whather it's french or italian or japanese you really don't need a cookbook anymore.

Tomas burgess Executive chef

Masterchef

Unique and delicious dishes from the worlds best masterchefs.
